name: EarthRegions
description:
# Classification of Earth plasma regions.

This module use the predefined models available in [Github](https://gitlab.com/aidaspace/notebooks_aida/-/tree/master/04_sitl_classification_region).

The methode is fully describe in: Automatic Classification of Plasma Regions in Near-Earth Space With Supervised Machine Learning: Application to Magnetospheric Multi Scale 2016â€“2019 Observations - Breuillard Hugo, Dupuis Romain, Retino Alessandro, Le Contel Olivier, Amaya Jorge, Lapenta Giovanni - Published 2020 Frontiers in Astronomy and Space Sciences. [DOI](https://doi.org/10.3389/fspas.2020.00055)
